extendedInfo.description: Report an outage and track its restoration with the DTE Energy Outage Tracker. While the powerâs out, want to find a cup of coffee? A hot meal? Or just need to get some groceries? Look up businesses that have power and get in touch with them.Features-	report a power outage, dim or flickering lights by entering an address or phone number-	track restoration progress with updates from DTE-	see what areas have outages and how many are affected-	look up nearby businesses to see who has powerPermissionsWhy does the DTE Energy Outage Center app ask for so many permissions?  We ask for these permissions so that we can provide you with the following useful features:Your Accounts, Find Account on Device, Read Google Service Configuration, Sync Settings, Read Sync Settings allows us to sync to Google Drive to save addresses.  This makes entering outages easier for you. You can choose opt out of this feature later.Your Location, Storage and Test Access to Protected Storage helps find your location on the outage map and enables Google maps. We also store your address on your device so that you can see your stored locations within the app.Camera allows you to use the flash of your camera as a flashlight to help you during a power outage. We do not access any of your pictures or your actual camera. We do not record images or video.Control Vibration and Prevent Device From Sleeping allows us to send you notifications. You can choose to opt out of this feature later, but you must initially grant permission for access to the Outage Center.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very helpful
reviews.author: Anjanette Hicks

reviews.comment: Outage map isn\'t working on my DROID 3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Color on map?
reviews.comment: Couple things here. What do the colors on the map even mean? So thats obviously pointless and doesnt tell me anything I need/want to know. The only thing the app does is let you report a problem without calling.... awesome cuz the estimated time has been way r Wrong both times my power went out. I would hope dte is spending the money on more crews cuz the app isnt cutting it.... step it up dte
reviews.author: James Fougnie

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: much easier than waiting on the phone
reviews.author: Renee Irvine

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: I do not think I need a map to tell me that I have no power. What the .... do the colors represent?
reviews.author: HAROLD KALLER

reviews.title: Can not find address!
reviews.comment: Downloaded app but it can not find home in canton with the mobile app yet the website can. The street is pond view ct  .
reviews.author: Loren Zaleski

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: What good is an app that doesn\'t even work? Every time I try to submit a problem it says invalid request
reviews.author: Michael Stapula

reviews.title: Not at all accurate
reviews.comment: App has said power would be restored in less than an hour for the past 7 hrs. Website says it wont be restored for another 17 hrs. Why doesn\'t the information match?
reviews.author: Chuck Vercellone

reviews.title: Good Concept
reviews.comment: This is a good concept, but it needs work.  Thank you for describing what you\'re using the permissions for.  I have to question whether DTE consumes the outage information because they do not send out notifications you request, or status updates to the app. I always call as well as a backup.  Also, between three different users, we\'re not sure what the different color zones in the outage maps mean. We\'re assuming the dark-purple zones indicate an outage? I\'ve also seen green and I think yellow zones. A legend would be useful.
reviews.author: Steve Amburgy

reviews.title: Stupid, doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Selected SMS but kept getting automated voice calls saying crews in my area, even after my power had come on 5 hrs prior.  Plus said power restoration ETA 14 hrs away!  Deleted outage and it\'s still giving me alerts!!!
reviews.author: J Ditmeyer

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: No power updates at all.   My power has been back on for three days and the app still says I have no power.  Un installed
reviews.author: Kevin R

reviews.title: Reporting a problem...works But...
reviews.comment: But way to intrusive wanting access to Google + WHY? AND to Google drive WHY? please explain the need for this.
reviews.author: Deb Bradley

reviews.title: Woah!  Permissions!
reviews.comment: Was awesome, I loved this app but the new permissions are extremely invasive. I\'m sorry but they don\'t need my friends phone numbers... Pass on this update, I will miss you Dte :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks but no thanks
reviews.comment: Useful app but this update is requesting permissions that I find excessive and obtrusive. Will not be updating until this is amended.
reviews.author: Julia Horodynski

reviews.title: Garbage!
reviews.comment: Its useless... I downloaded it so I didn\'t have to call \357\273\277the stupid automated thing that hangs up on me and pay my bill here.. nope. What\'s \357\273\277the point? Its 2013.. get with \357\273\277the technology.
reviews.author: Jay SoGay Murphy

reviews.title: Permissions
reviews.comment: Adding all those invasive permissions without any explanation is just asking for bad ratings from cautious people like me. Why does it need to read so much of my personal info and use my camera? Not updating until the situation is resolved.
reviews.author: Mark Injerd

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work Right
reviews.comment: The power outage map does not work on my phone. Reporting a power outage for my address does work and is much easier than trying to call them on their 800 number.
reviews.author: Richard Lowthian

reviews.title: Intrusive permissions
reviews.comment: No to this update. Please remove intrusive permissions.
reviews.author: Eric S

reviews.title: Privileges
reviews.comment: Requires far to many invasive privileges, in the latest update. Many numerous permissions including reading contacts, Google sync settings, Camera. Will not update!
reviews.author: Brett Goss

reviews.title: no no NO!
reviews.comment: Sorry, but I can see no reason for the privacy intrusive permissions other than to exploit their users! Bye bye!
reviews.author: Dave W
